issue.title: reverse algorithm should use iter_swap rather than swap

discussion.p: Shouldn't the effects say "applies iter_swap to all pairs..."?

blockquote.p: Effects: For each non-negative integer i <= (last - first)/2, applies swap to all pairs of iterators first + i, (last - i) - 1.
Effects: For each non-negative integer i <= (last - first)/2, applies iter_swap to all pairs of iterators first + i, (last - i) - 1.
